people_also_ask.question: Is Legend of Zelda Link's Awakening worth it?
people_also_ask.heading: Link's Awakening is a great buy for any Legend of Zelda fan. With two difficulty modes, it's a good game for beginners and veteran gamers alike. It has a unique story, beautiful graphics, and a soundtrack that will have you humming for days. Plus, it's fun.26-Sep-2019
people_also_ask.title: Is Link's Awakening remake for Switch worth the $60 price tag?

people_also_ask.question: What is the point of Legend of Zelda Link's Awakening?
people_also_ask.heading: Like most games in The Legend of Zelda series, Link's Awakening is an action-adventure game focused on exploration and combat. The majority of the game takes place from an overhead perspective. The player traverses the overworld of Koholint Island while fighting monsters and exploring underground dungeons.Like most games in The Legend of Zelda seriesThe Legend of Zelda seriesZelda is a nickname for the feminine name Griselda, which may originally have meant "dark battle" or "strong woman;" often combined to mean "Grey fighting maiden." It is also the feminine form of the Yiddish name Selig, meaning "blessed", "happy".https://en.wikipedia.org › wiki › Zelda_(given_name)Zelda (given name) - Wikipedia, Link's Awakening is an action-adventure gameaction-adventure gameAction-adventure is a video game genre that combines core elements from both the action game and adventure game genres. ... Therefore, action-adventure games engage both reflexes and problem-solving in both violent and non-violent situations.https://en.wikipedia.org › wiki › Action-adventure_gameAction-adventure game - Wikipedia focused on exploration and combat. The majority of the game takes place from an overhead perspective. The player traverses the overworld of Koholint Island while fighting monsters and exploring underground dungeons.
people_also_ask.title: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: How many hours of gameplay is Legend of Zelda Link's Awakening?
people_also_ask.heading: When focusing on the main objectives, The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening is about 14 Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 20½ Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: How long is The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening?

knowledge_panel.description: the legend of zelda: link's awakening is an action-adventure game developed by grezzo and published by nintendo for the nintendo switch. it was released worldwide on september 20, 2019. link's awakening is a remake of the 1993 game for the game boy. wikipedia
